document.full_text: blackrock, the money management giant, has sent a letter to british regulators arguing that banks intentionally overprice initial public offerings to raise higher fees.
document.title: in i.p.o. price debate, an investment giant weighs in
lines_and_colors: blackrock, the money management giant, has sent a letter to british regulators arguing that banks intentionally overprice initial public offerings to raise higher fees.
